kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://rahulshettyacademy.com/Library/Addbook.php path_url=/Library/Addbook.php headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.3', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '75', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Avinash", "isbn": "435875", "aisle": "4552", "author": "Avinash"}'
